34 template<typename T>
35 void compute_variances(const std::vector<T>& points, size_t size, const int D,
36  float* var, int sample = -1)
37 {
38  assert(points.size() > 0);
39  if(sample < 0)
40  sample = size;
41  else if((int)size > sample)
42  size = sample;
43 
44  float avg[D];
45 
46  // i = 0, i_n = 1
47  assert(D > 0);
48  #if __cplusplus >= 201103L
49  std::copy_n(&points[0], D, avg);
50  #else
51  std::copy(&points[0], &points[0] + D, avg);
52  #endif
53 
54  // i = 1, i_n = 0.5
55  if (size >= 2) {
56  //assert(points[1].dim() == D);
57  for (int d = D - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
58  float const delta = points[1 * D + d] - avg[d];
59  avg[d] += delta * 0.5f;
60  var[d] = delta * (points[1 * D + d] - avg[d]);
61  }
62  } else {
63  std::fill_n(var, D, 0.0f);
64  }
65 
66  // i = 2, ...
67  for (size_t i = 2; i < size; ) {
68  {
69  const float i_n = 1.0f / (1.0f + i);
70  //assert(points[i].dim() == D);
71  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
72  float const delta = points[i * D + d] - avg[d];
73  avg[d] += delta * i_n;
74  var[d] += delta * (points[i * D + d] - avg[d]);
75  }
76  }
77  ++i;
78 
79  if (i >= size) break;
80  {
81  const float i_n = 1.0f / (1.0f + i);
82  //assert(points[i].dim() == D);
83  for (int d = D - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
84  float const delta = points[i * D + d] - avg[d];
85  avg[d] += delta * i_n;
86  var[d] += delta * (points[i * D + d] - avg[d]);
87  }
88  }
89  ++i;
90  }
91 }
92 
106 template<typename T>
107 void compute_variances(size_t t, const std::vector<T>& points, const int D,
108  size_t size, float* avg,
109  float* var, size_t* split_dims, int sample = -1)
110 {
111  assert(points.size() > 0);
112  if(sample < 0)
113  sample = size;
114  else if((int)size > sample)
115  size = sample;
116 
117  // i = 0, i_n = 1
118  assert(D > 0);
119  #if __cplusplus >= 201103L
120  std::copy_n(&points[0], D, avg);
121  #else
122  std::copy(&points[0], &points[0] + D, avg);
123  #endif
124 
125  // i = 1, i_n = 0.5
126  if (size >= 2) {
127  //assert(points[1].dim() == D);
128  for (int d = D - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
129  float const delta = points[1 * D + d] - avg[d];
130  avg[d] += delta * 0.5f;
131  var[d] = delta * (points[1 * D + d] - avg[d]);
132  }
133  } else {
134  std::fill_n(var, D, 0.0f);
135  }
136 
137  // i = 2, ...
138  for (size_t i = 2; i < size; ) {
139  {
140  const float i_n = 1.0f / (1.0f + i);
141  //assert(points[i].dim() == D);
142  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
143  float const delta = points[i * D + d] - avg[d];
144  avg[d] += delta * i_n;
145  var[d] += delta * (points[i * D + d] - avg[d]);
146  }
147  }
148  ++i;
149 
150  if (i >= size) break;
151  {
152  const float i_n = 1.0f / (1.0f + i);
153  //assert(points[i].dim() == D);
154  for (int d = D - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
155  float const delta = points[i * D + d] - avg[d];
156  avg[d] += delta * i_n;
157  var[d] += delta * (points[i * D + d] - avg[d]);
158  }
159  }
160  ++i;
161  }
162 
163  /* Find t dimensions with largest scaled variance. */
164  kthLargest(var, D, t, split_dims);
165  //for(int g=0;g<t;++g)
166  // std::cout << var[g] << "\n";
167 
168  /*
169  klein
170  2703.59
171 2685.96
172 3596.94
173 3575.21
174 3578.98
175 sphere
176 557.436
177 564.388
178 566.614
179 563.327
180 575.483
181 
182 */
183 
184 }

216 template<typename T>
217 std::vector<size_t>::iterator find_median(
218  const std::vector<T>& v_p, std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_begin,
219  std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_end, const size_t middle,
220  const size_t atDim, const size_t D)
221 {
222  std::nth_element(v_i_begin, v_i_begin + middle, v_i_end,
223  [&](int lhs, int rhs) {
224  return v_p[lhs * D + atDim] < v_p[rhs * D + atDim];
225  });
226  //std::cout << "middle = " << middle << std::endl;
227  return v_i_begin + middle;
228 }
229 
240 template<typename T>
241 std::vector<size_t>::iterator find_median(
242  std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_begin,
243  std::vector<size_t>::iterator &v_i_end, const size_t middle,
244  std::vector<T>& t_dims)
245 {
246  std::nth_element(v_i_begin, v_i_begin + middle, v_i_end,
247  [&t_dims](int lhs, int rhs) {
248  return t_dims[lhs] < t_dims[rhs];
249  });
250  return v_i_begin + middle;
251 }
